post.summary: List the resources currently being monitored by the Logz monitor resource.

get.summary: List all operations provided by Microsoft.Logz.
List all monitors under the specified subscription.
List all monitors under the specified resource group.
Get the properties of a specific monitor resource.

put.summary: Create a monitor resource. This create operation can take upto 10 minutes to complete.

delete.summary: Delete a monitor resource. This delete operation can take upto 10 minutes to complete.

location.description: URL to query for status of the operation.

get.summary: List the tag rules for a given monitor resource.

put.summary: Create or update a tag rule set for a given monitor resource.

get.summary: Get a tag rule set for a given monitor resource.

delete.summary: Delete a tag rule set for a given monitor resource.

location.description: URL to query for status of the operation.

get.summary: List the single sign-on configurations for a given monitor resource.

put.summary: Configures single-sign-on for this resource. This operation can take upto 10 minutes to complete.

get.summary: Gets the Logz single sign-on resource for the given Monitor.
List the sub account under a given monitor resource.

put.summary: Create sub account under a given monitor resource. This create operation can take upto 10 minutes to complete.

get.summary: Get a sub account under a given monitor resource.

delete.summary: Delete a sub account resource. This delete operation can take upto 10 minutes to complete.

location.description: URL to query for status of the operation.

get.summary: List the tag rules for a given sub account resource.

put.summary: Create or update a tag rule set for a given sub account resource.

get.summary: Get a tag rule set for a given monitor resource.

delete.summary: Delete a tag rule set for a given monitor resource.

location.description: URL to query for status of the operation.

post.summary: List the resources currently being monitored by the Logz sub account resource.
Returns the payload that needs to be passed as a request for installing Logz.io agent on a VM.
Sending request to update the collection when Logz.io agent has been installed on a VM for a given monitor.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body to update the collection for agent installed in the given monitor.

post.summary: List the compute resources currently being monitored by the Logz sub account resource.
Returns the payload that needs to be passed in the request body for installing Logz.io agent on a VM.
Sending request to update the collection when Logz.io agent has been installed on a VM for a given monitor.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body to update the collection for agent installed in the given monitor.

post.summary: List the compute resources currently being monitored by the Logz main account resource.
List the user's roles configured on Logz.io side for the account corresponding to the monitor resource.

MonitoredResource.description: The properties of a resource currently being monitored by the Logz monitor resource.

id.description: The ARM id of the resource.

sendingMetrics.description: Flag indicating if resource is sending metrics to Logz.

reasonForMetricsStatus.description: Reason for why the resource is sending metrics (or why it is not sending).

sendingLogs.description: Flag indicating if resource is sending logs to Logz.

reasonForLogsStatus.description: Reason for why the resource is sending logs (or why it is not sending).

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.

OperationDisplay.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Type on which the operation is performed, e.g., 'monitors'.

operation.description: Operation type, e.g., read, write, delete, etc.

description.description: Description of the operation, e.g., 'Write monitors'.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

OperationListResult.description: Result of GET request to list the Microsoft.Logz operations.

value.description: List of operations supported by the Microsoft.Logz provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

ProvisioningState.description: Flag specifying if the resource provisioning state as tracked by ARM.

MonitoringStatus.description: Flag specifying if the resource monitoring is enabled or disabled.

MarketplaceSubscriptionStatus.description: Flag specifying the Marketplace Subscription Status of the resource. If payment is not made in time, the resource will go in Suspended state.

enterpriseAppId.description: The Id of the Enterprise App used for Single sign on.

singleSignOnUrl.description: The login URL specific to this Logz Organization.

emailAddress.description: Email of the user used by Logz for contacting them if needed

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the user used by Logz for contacting them if needed

usageType.description: different usage type like PAYG/COMMITTED. this could be enum

billingCycle.description: different billing cycles like MONTHLY/WEEKLY. this could be enum

planDetails.description: plan id as published by Logz

MonitorProperties.description: Properties specific to the monitor resource.

id.description: ARM id of the monitor resource.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

type.description: The type of the monitor resource.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.

MonitorUpdateProperties.description: The set of properties that can be update in a PATCH request to a monitor resource.

LogzMonitorResourceUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for a PATCH request to a monitor resource.

tags.description: The new tags of the monitor resource.

TagAction.description: Valid actions for a filtering tag. Exclusion takes priority over inclusion.

FilteringTag.description: The definition of a filtering tag. Filtering tags are used for capturing resources and include/exclude them from being monitored.

name.description: The name (also known as the key) of the tag.

LogRules.description: Set of rules for sending logs for the Monitor resource.

sendAadLogs.description: Flag specifying if AAD logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendSubscriptionLogs.description: Flag specifying if subscription logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendActivityLogs.description: Flag specifying if activity logs from Azure resources should be sent for the Monitor resource.

filteringTags.description: List of filtering tags to be used for capturing logs. This only takes effect if SendActivityLogs flag is enabled. If empty, all resources will be captured. If only Exclude action is specified, the rules will apply to the list of all available resources. If Include actions are specified, the rules will only include resources with the associated tags.

MonitoringTagRulesProperties.description: Definition of the properties for a TagRules resource.

MonitoringTagRules.description: Capture logs and metrics of Azure resources based on ARM tags.

id.description: The id of the rule set.

type.description: The type of the rule set.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.

SingleSignOnStates.description: Various states of the SSO resource

enterpriseAppId.description: The Id of the Enterprise App used for Single sign-on.

singleSignOnUrl.description: The login URL specific to this Logz Organization.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.

VMExtensionPayload.description: Response of payload to be passed while installing VM agent.

apiKey.description: API Key corresponding to the resource.

region.description: Logz.io region where the resource has been created.

VMHostUpdateState.description: Various states of the updating vm extension on resource

id.description: Request of a list vm host update operation.

agentVersion.description: Version of the Logz agent installed on the VM.

VMHostUpdateRequest.description: Request of a list VM Host Update Operation.

vmResourceIds.description: Request of a list vm host update operation.

state.description: Specifies the state of the operation - install/ delete.

VMResourcesListResponse.description: Response of a list VM Host Update Operation.

value.description: Response of a list vm host update operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.

UserRoleRequest.description: Request for checking user's role for Logz.io account.

emailAddress.description: Email of the user used by Logz for contacting them if needed

UserRole.description: User roles on configured in Logz.io account.

UserRoleResponse.description: Response for checking user's role for Logz.io account.

UserRoleListResponse.description: Response for list of user's role for Logz.io account.

value.description: List of user roles for Logz.io account.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.
